name: Toys Survival
description:
This an 3d action adventure survival third person shooter game based on a fantasy story of toys having life. In this game you are a toy need to kill evil toys which are black hearted and they want to kill you. You need to score maximum. Per kill has 10 points. This Game is created by Zahid MZIWA.

Support us by buying our cheap webhosting http://zahidserver.runhosting.net/
